sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含"忍耐，耐心"之意。
means: patience ： 普通用词，通常指不急不躁的容忍态度或能力。
endurance ： 侧重指忍受艰辛或痛苦的能力。

word_mean: 船舶一次装足燃油、滑油和淡水等，在正常装载和海况条件下航行的最大距离。
航空器耗尽其可用燃料所能持续飞行的时间。

sentence.Network_en: He showed remarkable endurance throughout his illness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在整个生病期间表现出非凡的忍耐力。

sentence.Network_en: Goaded beyond endurance, she turned on him and hit out.
sentence.Network_cn: 她被气得忍无可忍，于是转身向他猛击。

sentence.Network_en: The recruits were put through a week of gruelling endurance tests.
sentence.Network_cn: 新兵要接受为期一周艰苦的耐力测试.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 健康幸福贪婪恐惧 - Nut.Berry - 网易博客 ... dexterity 敏捷 endurance 耐力 enegry 能量.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... endure v 持久，耐久 endurance n 忍耐力 indurate v 使坚硬，使坚固.
专八词汇表_百度文库 ... endear 使受喜爱 endurance 耐久力，持久力 energetic 积极的；精力旺盛的.
《Friends》词汇表B ... lemans n. <古>爱人,情夫,情妇 endurance n. 忍耐(力), 持久(力), 耐久(性) buckle n. 带扣v.扣住, 变弯曲.

list.abs: 烈空坐_百度百科 ... 投掷 Fling 忍耐（endure） Endure 龙之波动 Dragon Pulse.
英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... confess 坦白 endure 忍受 contemplate 细想.
建筑专业英语词汇(E) ... endurance strength 耐久强度 endurance test 疲劳试验 endurance testing machine 疲劳试验机.
新编大学英语单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... endure v. 持续， 持久 enduring a. 持续的， 持久的 frown n. 皱眉， 蹙额， 不悦.
松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... emulate:n. 仿效 10。 enduring:adj. 持久的, 不朽的 11。 bootless:adj. 无用的, 无益的 12。.
cliff是什么意思?_百度知道 ... Heel： 鞋后跟 endurable adj. 可忍受的 sole adj. 单独的，唯一的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'continued existence, ability to last'; formerly also as indurance): from Old French, from endurer 'make hard' (see endure)

entry.def: Endurance is the ability to continue with an unpleasant or difficult situation, experience, or activity over a long period of time.

example.ex: The exercise obviously will improve strength and endurance.
example.tran: 这种锻炼会明显改善体力，增加耐力。

means.word_mean: 1. the power to withstand hardship or stress;
2. a state of surviving; remaining alive

auth_sentence.content: So endurance of all the assets involved is important.
auth_sentence.res_content: So endurance of all the assets involved is important.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So endurance of all the assets involved is important.

auth_sentence.content: Insect-bitten beyond endurance, his family fled within weeks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Insect-bitten beyond endurance, his family fled within weeks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Insect-bitten beyond endurance, his family fled within weeks.

auth_sentence.content: That was my whole thing; it was endurance.
auth_sentence.res_content: That was my whole thing; it was endurance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That was my whole thing; it was endurance.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dour=dur心硬不为所动→adj.冷酷的,严厉的
dur持久,延续,坚硬+able……的→adj.持久的,耐久的
ob加强+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate……的→加强硬→顽固
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ation表名词→n.持久;期间;持续时间
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ess表名词或动词→硬压→强迫
endure[v.忍受,持久,持续]+ance表名词→n.忍耐[力],持久[力],耐久[性]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在……的期间, 在……的时候
stems_affixes.word_buile: dur延续+ing状态→prep.在……的期间, 在……的时候
in进入+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate使……→使成为坚硬
per贯穿+dur持久+e→v.持久, 继续

Sentence.sentence: It demands physical endurance and patience.

sentences.en: She reached the end of endurance.

jushi.chinese: 他的残酷令人无法忍受。

jushi.english: She reached the end of endurance.
They eventually completed the endurance tests.
jushi.chinese: 他们终于完成了耐力测验。
